We're Making Waves in Solar Financing.
Our mission at BlueWave is to improve access to solar. Our latest innovation brings customers a path to more affordable solar ownership.
Introducing: The BlueWave FlexRate Loan, reducing the cost of solar for customers and giving your team another option for closing solar sales.
Offer BlueWave's FlexRate Loan and become a solar pioneer!
Low fixed rate through year 5 for customers Capped rate annual adjustments based on the Current Prime Rate No penalties for early repayments at any time during loan term Lifetime ceiling on interest rates to protect customers
Interested in learning more?
